desc: Welcome dashes to MyDoxie! The best spot for us dachshunds to hang out. This space is small-dog friendly, tried + tested to keep doxies safe while we're having fun. This website is so much more than an online store - we truly care about the wellbeing of our daxie community and donate 10% profits to Devoted2Daschunds

layout.text:
Dashies, it’s time we put ourselves first!
My Doxie is here to help us feel great and look even better no matter how old or young we are.

So please wipe your paws and make yourself at home
